sentences.en: All Judah then brought the tithe of the grain, wine and oil into the storehouses.
sentences.cn: 尼13:12犹大众人就把五谷 、 酒、油的十分之一、入库房.

sentences.en: But now they have been adapted for use as storehouses or granaries.
sentences.cn: 不过现在它们已经被改建,用作库房或粮仓了.

sentences.en: During this period , new kinds of modem merchant capital - Broker's Storehouses started rising. "
sentences.cn: 同时新式的近代商业资本-- 行栈 资本开始兴起.

sentences.en: He sends lightning with the rain and brings out the wind from his storehouses.
sentences.cn: 他造电随雨而闪,从他府库中带出风来.

sentences.en: Museums serve as storehouses for treasures. In the meantime, they are a major educational force.
sentences.cn: 博物馆作为珍宝的储存库, 同时也是一种得力的教育手段.

sentences.en: Profe ional clothes picture storehouses, provide the latest clothing trend.
sentences.cn: 创新专业服装设计图库, 为您提供最新服装流行趋势!

sentences.en: Professional storehouses resolve the merchant's anxieties for keeping goods stored.
sentences.cn: 专业的仓库为商户解决了货品存储的后顾之忧.

sentences.en: Some of the cottages were still lived in by old folk; others had been turned into barns and storehouses.
sentences.cn: 有些村舍里仍住着老人；有些已经改作粮仓和仓库。

sentences.en: Storehouses were built close to the docks.
With its storehouses bursting with grain, the farm had to build more granaries.
sentences.cn: 农场的仓库都堆满了粮食, 只好新盖一些谷仓.

trans.tran_cn: 仓库( storehouse的名词复数 )，货栈，知识宝库，知识丰富的人
trans.tran_en: A storehouse is a building in which things, usually food, are stored
